messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] street names in Albuquerque
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 8/15/2005 9:37:12 AM Eastern Daylight Time, ... Oooh! That sounds like Canton, Ohio-downtown is all streets the  same names, but different
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/15/2005 9:37:12 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
tuckervill2@... writes:

> And I won't even get into the parkways. East Parkway North. South
> Parkway
> East.

Oooh! That sounds like Canton, Ohio-downtown is all streets the same names,
but different quadrants; four 1st Streets=1st St. NW, 1st St. NE, 1st St. SW,
1st Street SE, four 2nd streets and so on-and the streets go up into at least
the 30s. We were COMPLETELY lost the first time we went down there, since we
weren't used to paying attention to the "directionals" on our streets up here.
Add to that the fact that most of the streets in downtown are one-way streets,
and it is SO easy to get lost if you aren't familiar with the area or the
street naming!

Sang
-History shows again and again how nature points up the folly of man.
BOC-


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] street names in Albuquerque
messages.msgSnippet: Where I lived in Memphis there were lots of road names that  were named for the towns they connected.  Raliegh-LaGrange Road.   Collierville-Arlington Road.
messages.messageBody:
Where I lived in Memphis there were lots of road names that were named for
the towns they connected. Raliegh-LaGrange Road. Collierville-Arlington
Road. If you're new to Memphis, and don't know anything about the surrounding
towns, it's a bit odd to see Col.-Arl. Rd. What the heck does that mean? It's
pretty common all across Tennessee to name the towns "-ville" and name the
roads "-ville Pike"

And I won't even get into the parkways. East Parkway North. South Parkway
East. @@

Karen

www.badchair.net


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: street names in Albuquerque
messages.msgSnippet: I lived on Pennsylvania (I think) Street near Candelaria and Stardust Drive near Louisiana and Comanche -- although also on Cathy St., which is nice and short.
messages.messageBody:
I lived on Pennsylvania (I think) Street near Candelaria and Stardust Drive
near Louisiana and Comanche -- although also on Cathy St., which is nice and
short.

Kathleen
now in LA
